job.title: Software Engineer (Java Designer/Developer)
job.description:
At Ford Motor Company, we believe freedom of movement drives human progress. We also believe in providing you with the freedom to define and realize your dreams. With our incredible plans for the future of mobility, we have a wide variety of opportunities for you to accelerate your career potential as you help us define tomorrow’s transportation.
As a key member of our Information Technology group, you’ll play a critical part in shaping the future of mobility. If you’re looking for the chance to leverage advanced technology to redefine the transportation landscape, enhance the customer experience and improve people’s lives, this is the opportunity for you. Join us and challenge your IT expertise and analytical skills to help create vehicles that are as smart as you are.
What You’ll Be Able To Do
Responsible for designing and developing capabilities for a Java application used for viewing, requesting and using data exchange services at Ford. This role requires cross-organizational interaction, communicating with users and ensuring the quality of existing and new capabilities.
Work with cross functional team members and business owners to identify requirements
Design/develop application capabilities from scratch, including all front- and back-end aspects
Create technical specifications and runbooks
Lead in test-driven development
Partner with a technical anchor and architects to design the architecture
Assure correct security and data protection settings
Responsible for maintaining application End-to-End
The Minimum Requirements We Seek
Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or other scientific field of study
4+ years of experience as a full stack Java developer including design, development and implementation which includes REST API based on Spring Boot Microservices architecture and Angular based UI development
4+ years of experience with CI/CD tools Jenkins, Github, or Nexus with code deployment in Pivotal Cloud Foundry
3+ years of experience with code/API security using Sonarqube, 42Crunch, or Checkmarx,
4+ years of experience with messaging interoperability with Rabbit MQ and experience with global application
The Preferred Requirements We Seek
Self- starter and problem solver
Excellent verbal and presentation skills
Java Certifications
Familiar with Agile methodology
What You Will Receive In Return
As part of the Ford family, you will enjoy excellent compensation and a comprehensive benefits package that includes generous PTO, retirement, savings and stock investment plans, incentive compensation and much more. You will also experience exciting opportunities for professional and personal growth and recognition.
If you have what it takes to help us redefine the future of mobility, we would love to have you join us.
Candidates for positions with Ford Motor Company must be legally authorized to work in the United States. Verification of employment eligibility will be required at the time of hire. Visa sponsorship is not available for this position.
We are an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to a culturally diverse workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, age, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status or protected veteran
For information on Ford’s benefits and compensation, click here: https://corporate.ford.com/content/dam/corporate/us/en-us/documents/careers/2021-benefits-and-comp-GSR-sal-plan-1.pdf
